QuestData.Title: Bound for Glory
QuestData.Description: Now I can properly send you back to Shattrath City. You've uncovered evidence of Kael'thas making pacts with the Burning Legion and you've got the key to the overlord's back door.$B$BMake sure Voren'thal doesn't topple over with excitement from the news - the old man's getting a bit fragile, if you know what I mean. You'll find him inside the Seer's Library at the Scryer's Tier.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Socrethar's Teleportation Stone to Voren'thal the Seer at the Scryer's Tier in Shattrath City.$B$BCompleting quests for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation to decrease.
QuestData.RewardText: You have no idea what this will mean for the Scryers, $n. You will have to excuse me while I catch my breath and assess the situation.
